name: Doki Doki Friday Night Funkin' Club (Original Version)
name_original: Doki Doki Friday Night Funkin' Club (Original Version)
description:
This is the original version of my DDFNFC mod for those that want to download the original after the plus update on GameBanana.

WARNING:

This mod contains spoilers for Doki Doki Literature Club. It is strongly recommended that you play the original game first. 

https://teamsalvato.itch.io/ddlc

This mod contains some mild poorly-drawn blood in one song for like 8 seconds.

This mod is not suitable for children or those who are easily disturbed.

Individuals suffering from Anxiety and Depression may not have a safe experience playing this mod.

By playing Doki Doki Friday Night Funkin' Club, you agree that you're at least 16 years of age and consent your exposure to mildly disturbing content.


Hi, Monika here!
Welcome to the Literature Club! It's always been a dream of mine to make something special out of the things I love. Now that The Boyfriend is here, you can help me make that dream come true in this "totally innocent" FNF Mod!

Our club is full of chit-chat and fun activities with all of my adorable and unique club members:
Sayori, the youthful bundle of sunshine who values happiness the most (but doesn't care about her own);
Natsuki, the deceivingly cute girl who packs an assertive punch (don't make her snap plz);
Yuri, the timid and mysterious one who finds comfort in the world of books (she's a cut above the rest);
And, of course, Monika, the president of the literature club! That's me!

I'm super excited for you to make friends with everyone, rap battle them, and help the Literature Club become a more intimate place for all my members. But I can tell already that you're a sweetheart—will you promise to spend the most time with me? (Pretty please? I've been waiting for this chance again for four years.) <3
